content: side with slip stitches chained loops a purl bump along the slip_stitch edge indicates the last stitch was knit and not purled continue to pick up and knit into this stitch it is not as attractive as the slipped sts but it is on the wrong side and with 80 blocks to admire no one will notice it when starting a new square always pick up and knit from a slip_stitch edge not a cast on edge if the sts are tight when you pick up and knit you are on the cast on edge not a slip_stitch edge if there are an even-number of stitches you probably forgot to lift the two slipped over the knit stitch in the central double decrease adding a new ball of yarn preferably add a new ball at the beginning of a square to do this fasten off the last stitch in the previous square start with the fastened off stitch and pick up and knit 17 sts from the chain edge do not add a new ball at the start or end of a row as this will spoil the slipped stitch chain edge abbreviations tbl through back loop psso pass the two slipped stitches over the knit stitch 2 sts have been decreased cdd center double decrease - slip 2 sts together knitwise as if to knit 2 together k1 with lh needle lift and pass the two slipped stitches over the knit stitch 2 sts have been decreased picking up and knitting the chain edge when picking up sts along the slip_stitch edge insert the needle under both legs of the stitch picking up half a stitch is a good option for heavier yarns when less bulk is desirable the following instructions are for a blanket knit with one colour if you are using more than one colour follow the instructions on page 5 how to cable cast on *insert the rh needle between stitch 1 and stitch 2 on lh needle wrap the yarn around the rh needle pull it through rotate the stitch 90° and place the stitch on the lh needle repeat from * until required number of sts are cast on getting started square a is the starting square and is only worked once start with a slip knot and work the knitted cast on for the next stitch to do this knit into the slip knot do not drop the slip knot from the lh needle turn the new stitch on the rh needle and put it back on the lh needle 2 sts cable cast on for a total of 35 sts turn and work the set-up row ws knit to last stitch purl 1 continue to the chart on page 3 work row 1 33 once then continue to square b 2 magic tiles blanket © brenda brayfield 2006 updated 2020 for personal use only cdd - slip 2 sts together knitwise as if to knit 2 together k1 with lh needle lift
